field.placeholder: Brief reason why you're taking this PTO
field.label: Reason for PTO

skuid__text.contents: Your PTO request has been sent to your manager. You'll hear back soon!

skuid__messageBlock.title: E-sign Doc waiting for you
skuid__messageBlock.description: There's a document waiting for your signature

skuid__messageBlock.title: Your PTO request is approved!
skuid__messageBlock.description: Your PTO request from May 22 - May 30 is approved. Enjoy the time off!

skuid__text.contents: It is almost Employee Appreciation Week which is my favorite week of the year here. I have big plans and can't wait for you all to be involved.
Tips to a 15 minute clean, declutter, and sanitize your workspace
